item.title: About Me
item.description: Coder & Photographer 我的设备 [工作] PC（i7 8700+32G+GTX 1066）with Dell 2720Q + Dell 2414H NUC 11（16G）with Dell 2520DR ThinkPad T450s（i7 6600U+8G） QNAP T453D mini with 512G + 256G + 4T Filco 87 Black Anne Pro II GPW G304 Macbook Air 2013 [生活] iPhone 11 Pro Max (256G) iPhone X (64G) iPad Pro 2019 12.9' Airpods Pro Bose QC30 Sony 1A-DAC [过往] Year 2018, PC(i5 8400 + 16G + GTX 1066) Year 2015, PC(E3 v3 + 16G + AMD graphic card) Year 2015, iPhone 6 Year 2013, Fujifilm X10 Year 2011, PC(i3 + 8G + AMD graphic card) Year 2011, Sony VAIO Laptop Year 2011, Nikon D90 Year 2005, Lenovo PC Last edited on 2022/01/26
